h2: Welcome to Zirmon Dental Atelier. A place where passionate and skillful dental ceramists create beautiful, natural looking dental restorations with friendly, helpful, and fair attitude.

Founded in 2017, set up on a small room at the corner of his house, doctor Kelvin Tantono started this dental atelier as a stepping stone in his career. Started with a CAD/CAM and solo performer style, he had strived through hard times in learning through failing.in 2019, he has assured himself that ceramist and the atelier are his life calling, hence leaving his career as dentist.After 3 years, in 2020, he expanded this atelier into bigger space to accommodate his growing team.Until this date, Zirmon Dental Atelier, which based in Medan, Indonesia, has been collaborating with dentists to bring naturally esthetic restorations for the patients.

##### Zirmon Dental Atelier

# Excellence and collaboration start here

## Welcome to Zirmon Dental Atelier. A place where passionate and skillful dental ceramists create beautiful, natural looking dental restorations with friendly, helpful, and fair attitude.

[Make Inquiry](#contact)

##### About Us

## **ZIRMON** Dental Atelier

## Founded in 2017, set up on a small room at the corner of his house, doctor Kelvin Tantono started this dental atelier as a stepping stone in his career. Started with a CAD/CAM and solo performer style, he had strived through hard times in learning through failing. in 2019, he has assured himself that ceramist and the atelier are his life calling, hence leaving his career as dentist. After 3 years, in 2020, he expanded this atelier into bigger space to accommodate his growing team. Until this date, Zirmon Dental Atelier, which based in Medan, Indonesia, has been collaborating with dentists to bring naturally esthetic restorations for the patients.

## zirmon warranty is now

## EXTENDED!

## Doctor Kelvin Tantono

##### Pricing

## Our Pricing

#### MONOLITHIC ZIRCONIA

Our base product. Efficient in cost, value, and time.

Best for both anterior and posterior crown, bridges, inlay and onlay.

#### IDR 1.350.000,- / UNIT

#### 3-5 WORKING DAYS

#### LITHIUM DISILICATE

Esthetic material for minimum invasive treatment plan. Bondable.

Best for veneers, inlay, onlay and single crown

#### IDR 1.500.000,- / UNIT

#### 5-7 WORKING DAYS

#### VERIFICATION JIG (3D printed)

To make things easier and sure, we believe a verification jig can be used during try in or cementing multiple restorations and implant abudments

#### IDR 100.000,- / UNIT

#### porcelain layering

Our signature additional service to enhance esthetic. Best to combine with zirconia for long bridges, single crown matching and anterior crowns with dark abudment

#### additional

#### IDR 450.000,- / UNIT

#### 1-2 WORKING DAYS

#### GUM LAYERING / PINK PORCELAIN

Not only white is important in oral esthetic, but pink plays significant role as well. Huge resorption, bone loss, compromised soft tissue? We have the solution.

#### additional

#### IDR 450.000,- / UNIT

#### 1-2 WORKING DAYS

#### feldspathic

A very high end artistic work with a very sensitive technique Best for very thin veneers, prepless or non-prep.

#### IDR 3.500.000,- / UNIT

#### 7-10 WORKING DAYS

#### wing / rest

Some special cases that need reinforcement for stability, we can add wing or rest. Best for cantilever or maryland case.

#### IDR 300.000,- / UNIT

#### digital wax up & 3d printing

#### IDR 400.000,-/ FIRST 4 UNITS

We maximize the usage of digital technology to plan best treatment for you patient. This service include 4 units of wax up / arch

#### additional

#### IDR 100.000,- / UNIT

#### polymethyl methacrylate

###### **(PMMA)**

a fast solution for temporary and try in for high-risk case.

#### IDR 200.000,- / UNIT

#### 5-7 WORKING DAYS

#### SURGICAL GUIDE

#### IDR 400.000,- / FIRST 4 CERVICAL

For more predictable gingivectomy. Available in clear resin or white opaque resin.

#### additional

#### IDR 100.000,- / CERVICAL

#### implant processing fee

When we go for implant restorations, we put extra effort to process the model, abudment adjusting, and gingival masking

#### additional

#### IDR 200.000,- / IMPLANT

#### Our portfolio

By holding to the core values, we have been passionately creating beautiful and natural looking restorations.

##### Our Team

## Meet With Expert Team

## **ZIRMON** EXCEL

This team is dedicated for fast case turnover without any compromise in quality.  
  
Choose EXCEL for posterior crowns, simple restorations that require efficiency in time, and value.

## **ZIRMON** marvel

Team that specializes for more complex cases including anterior restorations and smile makeover cases.  
  
Choose MARVEL for cases where we aim for higher quality. Time is what they need for maximum performance.

## **ZIRMON** fascina

FASCINA team is formed due to high demand of quality works.  
  
The members of FASCINA team are carefully picked by our Chief Technician Officer to ensure their work are as close as possible to nature. Their passion and experience are build upon thousands of cases.

## **ZIRMON** admin

Team that exist to make sure that all communication, investigation, and logistic go well and comfortable with our clients.  
  
Their main value of service is: Helpful
Their attitude: Humble

## **ZIRMON** bali

With the support of our clients, we are now exist in Bali and Jakarta to support efficiency of case turnover and logistics

## **ZIRMON** Jakarta

And our latest branch is located in the heart of Indonesia, Jakarta

## **ZIRMON** MAGNI

Handled by the Chief Technician of Zirmon Dental Atelier alone.  
  
dr Kelvin Tantono as the founder of Zirmon Dental Atelier has proved his love for dental restorations by attending several trainings abroad and share his expertise in several trainings and seminars.   
  
MAGNI is a very personalized type of work without intervention of any other hands except the hands of dr Kelvin Tantono.   
  
When enjoying his love for dental restorations, dr Kelvin demand patience because he believes that we can buy quality with time.

## maximize benefit with ZIRMON

## 1

## use zirmon loyaty apps

With Zirmon Loyaty Apps we can update the progress of our case , check the estimated finish date before sending the case, claim cashback, and also enjoy the reward as our loyal customer

## 2

## choose the right team

In Zirmon we encouraged tou to choose the team to handle your case to achieve the best effective and efficient result base on time and value. choosing the right team will help you receive the best case in the quickest time with best value

## 3

## send us feedback

We will follow up your case and we will be very please if you can give us feedback so that we can understand your need and expactation. By doing that, we can build chemistry and better collaboration experience

## GET IN TOUCH WITH ZIRMON

At Zirmon Dental Atelier, we value open communication and are always here to assist you with your dental restoration needs. Whether you’re a dentist looking for a trusted partner or have general inquiries, we’re just a message away.
